flawed_nl_solution:
The first 6 bunches had 6 x 9 x 14 = <<6*9*14=756>>756 bananas.
There were 10 - 6 = <<10-6=6>>6 remaining bunches.
The 6 remaining bunches had 6 x 12 x 9 = <<6*12*9=648>>648 bananas.
All together, there were 756 + 648 = <<756+648=1404>>1404 bananas
Each monkey would get 1404/12 = <<1404/12=117>>117 bananas.
#### 117

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
